song_name: Faith is for the Transient People
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Faith is for the Transient People is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Faith is for the Transient People has sections analyzed in the following keys: C♯ Minor,  and F♯ Minor.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
